recipes.name: Sinigang
recipes.description: A tangy and savory Filipino soup with a rich broth, vegetables, and your choice of meat.

recipes.name: Adobo
recipes.description: A classic Filipino dish made with marinated meat in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices.

recipes.name: Leche Flan
recipes.description: A creamy caramel custard dessert that's a staple in Filipino celebrations.

recipes.name: Lumpia
recipes.description: Crispy spring rolls filled with a savory mix of vegetables and meat, perfect for any occasion.

recipes.name: Banana Cue
recipes.description: Caramelized bananas on skewers, coated with brown sugar and fried to perfection.

recipes.name: Halo-Halo
recipes.description: A colorful and refreshing dessert made with shaved ice, milk, fruits, and sweet toppings.

recipes.name: Kare-Kare
recipes.description: A hearty stew with peanut sauce, oxtail, and assorted vegetables, served with shrimp paste.

recipes.name: Kinilaw
recipes.description: A Filipino ceviche dish with fresh fish marinated in vinegar, lime, and spices.

recipes.name: Taho
recipes.description: A warm and sweet snack made of silken tofu, arnibal (syrup), and sago pearls.

recipes.name: Bulalo
recipes.description: A comforting beef marrow stew with vegetables, perfect for cold weather.

recipes.name: Cassava Cake
recipes.description: A rich and chewy cake made from grated cassava, coconut milk, and a creamy topping.
